pages.text: The moonbow Strain$(br2)Base THC: 18% $(br)Base CBD: 7% $(br)Effect: Bad Omen
moonbow Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
moonbow Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
moonbow Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting moonbow Weed in an Extractor
You can package your moonbow weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
